anya-e0605n22:7: Datvāna maṁsaṁ rajjaṁ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n22:16: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṁ imaṁ,
anya-e0605n22:22: Cakkāvudhaṁ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n22:25: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n22:26: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṁ tava.
anya-e0605n22:29: Pitā vudikkhi taṁ māraṁ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n22:31: Tadā so asambhivācaṁ sīhanādaṁ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n22:32: Na jānāti sayaṁ mayhaṁ dāsabhāvapiyaṁ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n22:34: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n22:44: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n22:49: Nāhaṁ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n22:53: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṁ bahuṁ.
anya-e0605n22:55: Samantā dhajinaṁ disvā yuddhaṁ māraṁ savāhanaṁ,
anya-e0605n22:56: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṁ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n22:58: Yante taṁ nappasahati senaṁ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n22:59: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṁ pattaṁ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n22:61: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n22:65: Atthi thāmaṁ balaṁ mayhaṁ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n22:68: Mayhaṁ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n22:71: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṁ mahī.
anya-e0605n22:73: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṁ bāhuṁ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n22:77: Tasmiṁ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
